problems.problem_text: For a $120,000 mortgage at 6.125% for 30 years with monthly payments of $729.13, what is the remaining balance after the first year (12 payments)?
problems.problem_text_ru: Для ипотеки $120,000 под 6.125% на 30 лет с ежемесячным платежом $729.13, каков остаток после первого года (12 платежей)?
steps: First solve TVM: N=360, I/Y=6.125, PV=120000, compute PMT=-729.13
common_mistakes: Must solve TVM first before amortization
P1 and P2 define the payment range

problems.problem_text: Same mortgage ($120,000, 6.125%, 30 years). How much principal is paid in the first year?
problems.problem_text_ru: Та же ипотека ($120,000, 6.125%, 30 лет). Сколько основного долга выплачено за первый год?
common_mistakes: PRN is negative because it's money paid

problems.problem_text: Same mortgage. How much interest is paid in the first year?
problems.problem_text_ru: Та же ипотека. Сколько процентов выплачено за первый год?
steps: After TVM and P1/P2 are set
common_mistakes: First year has more interest than principal

problems.problem_text: A seller finances $82,000 at 7% for 30 years. After 5 years (60 payments), what is the balloon payment (remaining balance)?
problems.problem_text_ru: Продавец финансирует $82,000 под 7% на 30 лет. Через 5 лет (60 платежей), каков единовременный платёж (остаток)?
common_mistakes: Balloon payment is the balance remaining after the period

problems.problem_text: For the $82,000 loan at 7% for 30 years, how much total interest is paid in the first 5 years?
problems.problem_text_ru: Для кредита $82,000 под 7% на 30 лет, сколько всего процентов выплачено за первые 5 лет?
common_mistakes: INT shows cumulative interest for the period

problems.problem_text: A $50,000 car loan at 5% for 5 years with monthly payments. What is the balance after 2 years (24 payments)?

problems.problem_text: For payments 25-36 of the $50,000 car loan (5%, 5 years), how much principal is paid in year 3?
problems.problem_text_ru: Для платежей 25-36 автокредита $50,000 (5%, 5 лет), сколько основного долга выплачено за 3-й год?
